hero.description: +3 years of experience. Systems Engineer specialized in software architecture and scalable web systems.

items.title: Lead Infrastructure & Web Engineer
items.description: Leading the architecture and maintenance of high-performance web infrastructure. Specialized in Core Web Vitals optimization, advanced security protocols (DMARC, SPF, DKIM), and managing scalable server environments within Google Workspace ecosystems.

items.title: Digital Strategy & Web Analytics Specialist
items.description: Technical implementation of digital growth strategies. Responsible for data analysis, Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO), and technical configuration of tracking tools. Focused on improving organic visibility through technical SEO and data structuring.

items.title: Ges2l — Multi-tenant Modular ERP Ecosystem
items.description: A scalable enterprise platform for institutional and financial management. Architected with a Monorepo (Turborepo) using Nginx as a Reverse Proxy to serve specialized SPAs. Features Redis-backed session persistence (HttpOnly cookies) and a complex RBAC engine. Core migration to TypeScript in progress.

items.title: Arduino Control Web — PWA for ESP32
items.description: Web interface to control an ESP32 via WebSockets. Network optimizations for low latency, Access Point mode and UX focus for real-time control.

items.title: Cuello.dev — Personal portfolio
items.description: Personal site built with Astro and Tailwind, optimized for performance, accessibility and smooth animations.

paragraphs: I'm Andrés, a Systems Engineer focused on building robust digital products and well-engineered architectures. My approach bridges the gap between modern Full Stack development and a solid foundation in infrastructure management and security.
Currently, I lead the optimization of complex web ecosystems, focusing on critical performance, network security, and enterprise-level workflow automation.

Through projects like Ges2l, I architect high-scalability solutions, implementing technologies such as Redis for data persistence and Nginx for service orchestration, ensuring secure and high-performance final products.
My goal is to provide value to global companies through quality software development and efficient cloud infrastructure management.

meta.title: Andrés's Portfolio | Full Stack Software Engineer
meta.description: Systems Engineer with 2+ years of experience. Building unique, fast, and scalable web applications using JavaScript, React, and Node.js.
meta.ogTitle: Andrés Cuello - Full Stack Software Engineer
meta.ogDescription: Full stack developer specialized in the PERN stack and in building ultra-fast sites with Astro. Experienced in creating modern web applications using JavaScript and React.
meta.author: Andrés David Cuello Acosta
